text:
ðŸ‡¨ðŸ‡­ Gjon's Tears to return to represent Switzerland in 2021
Gjon’s Tears has been selected to represent Switzerland at the Eurovision Song Contest 2021. He was supposed to represent the country already in 2020, but the contest was cancelled.
Gjon’s Tears was selected by the broadcaster SRF to represent Switzerland with the song “RÃ©pondez-moi”. For next year’s contest he needs to find a new song, as the 2020 songs are not eligible to be used next year.
Are you happy to see Gjon’s Tears back? React below or let us know on social media @ESCXTRA!
